sanskrit: ईशावास्यमिदं सर्वं यत्किञ्च जगत्यां जगत्। तेन त्यक्तेन भुञ्जीथा मा गृधः कस्यस्विद्धनम्॥
transliteration: īśāvāsyam idaṃ sarvaṃ yat kiñca jagatyāṃ jagat tena tyaktena bhuñjīthā mā gṛdhaḥ kasya svid dhanam
translation: The entire universe is pervaded by the Lord. Enjoy through renunciation. Do not covet anybody's wealth.
keywords: pervaded lord renunciation enjoyment covetousness wealth universe

sanskrit: ॐ भद्रं कर्णेभिः शृणुयाम देवाः। भद्रं पश्येमाक्षभिर्यजत्राः॥
transliteration: oṃ bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devāḥ bhadraṃ paśyemākṣabhir yajatrāḥ
translation: Om! O Gods, may we hear with our ears what is auspicious. O adorable ones, may we see with our eyes what is auspicious.
keywords: om auspicious hear see gods adorable senses perception blessing

sanskrit: सर्वे वेदा यत्पदमामनन्ति तपांसि सर्वाणि च यद्वदन्ति। यदिच्छन्तो ब्रह्मचर्यं चरन्ति तत्ते पदं संग्रहेण ब्रवीम्योम्॥
transliteration: sarve vedā yat padam āmananti tapāṃsi sarvāṇi ca yad vadanti yad icchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti tat te padaṃ saṃgraheṇa bravīmy om
translation: The goal that all the Vedas declare, that all austerities proclaim, and seeking which people practice brahmacharya—that goal I tell you in brief: it is Om.
keywords: vedas goal austerities brahmacharya om sacred sound ultimate reality

sanskrit: यदा पश्यः पश्यते रुक्मवर्णं कर्तारमीशं पुरुषं ब्रह्मयोनिम्। तदा विद्वान् पुण्यपापे विधूय निरञ्जनः परमं साम्यमुपैति॥
transliteration: yadā paśyaḥ paśyate rukma-varṇaṃ kartāram īśaṃ puruṣaṃ brahma-yonim tadā vidvān puṇya-pāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyam upaiti
translation: When the seer beholds the golden-colored Maker, the Lord, the Person, the womb of Brahma, then the wise one, shaking off good and evil, becomes stainless and attains supreme equality.
keywords: seer golden maker lord person brahma wise good evil stainless equality
